content:
Hey all!
I hope I don't have to tell you that ACT 2020 is going to happen, and that it will be online.
The dedicated Zulip stream is here: https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/243068-ACT-2020
The main website is here: https://act2020.mit.edu/
A nice feature of this year is that there is going to be a tutorial day! Feel free to attend even if you feel that you are still learning. You'd be more than welcome to ask any questions :)

By the way, will people be "allowed in" to the tutorial day only if they register?

Conversely: someone was wondering if everyone who registers will be "accepted". It sounds like the answer to that is YES.
Yes and yes! We want to be inclusive, and avoid getting zoombombed.
